summary: Fixed duplicate @section('title') declarations in all 6 admin help view files. Removed the second hardcoded Persian title declarations, keeping only the translated version. This prevents Blade from concatenating titles and ensures proper page title rendering.
current_status: All help view files now have single @section('title') declarations. Issue resolved in: index.blade.php, salon-approval.blade.php, commission-configuration.blade.php, subscription-management.blade.php, review-moderation.blade.php, report-generation.blade.php.
